meanings.definition: A device consisting of a hollow ball that spins rapidly when filled with steam.
meanings.sent1: The eolopiles spun quickly due to the steam inside.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the eolopiles to understand their spinning motion.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the eolopiles danced around like tiny whirligigs.
meanings.sent4: The eolopiles resembled miniature tornadoes in their spinning action.
meanings.sent5: The eolopiles' rotation was as mesmerizing as a spinning top.

meanings.sent1: In the museum, you can see many eolopiles on display.
meanings.sent2: The collection of eolopiles showcased various designs and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The eolopiles in the exhibit seemed to form a tiny steam-powered army.
meanings.sent4: Among the artifacts, the eolopiles stood out like shiny marbles.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the clinking sounds of the eolopiles.
